marginalia.anchor_text: in quo vniunt[ur] cui illa passio p[ri]mo c[on]uenit p[er] prius est inno[m]i[n]atu[m] no[n] posse

position.marginalia_text: Vniversale in q[uo] plura vniunt[ur], innominatu[m] aliquando

marginalia.translation: The universal, in which more things are unified, is sometimes unnamed.

marginalia.anchor_text: S[ed] p[er] se p[ri]mo triangulo s[e]c[un]d[u]m q[uod] ip[s]um et p[er] posterius ysocheli sc[ilicet] speciei trianguli

position.marginalia_text: Inesse { p[er] se p[ri]mo p[er] posterij

marginalia.translation: To be there first for itself, for the following.
With which the unnamed connects first.

marginalia.anchor_text: phisicus de loco [et] te[m]porib[us] v[e]l motib[us] et etia[m] de potencijs
marginalia.translation: Physics, that is, space, time, movement and power.

marginalia.anchor_text: ad aliquid relate S[ed] ad aliquid dictu[m] est qua[n]titatis no[n] p[er] se

position.marginalia_text: Ad aliquid est q[ua]ntitatis no[n] p[er] se.

marginalia.translation: For something is of quantity not for itself.

underline.text: inferioribus q[uo] p[ri]mo et p[er] se c[on]uenit illi superiori
q[uod] est hoc i[d est] s[e]c[un]d[u]m aliq[uo]d c[om]mu[n]e ad
phisicus de loco [et] te[m]porib[us] v[e]l motib[us] et etia[m] de potencijs

q[uod] illud c[om]mune s[e]c[un]d[u]m q[uod] hec om[n]ia vnu[m] sunt sc[ilicet] linee t[em]p[or]a loca [etc] in quo vniunt[ur] cui illa passio p[ri]mo c[on]venit p[er] prius est inno[m]i[n]atu[m] no[n] posse hoc fieri vna[m] demo[n]stratione[m] s[ed] magis diuersas
dici de o[mn]i p[er] se et s[e]c[un]d[u]m q[uod] ip[su]m est no[n] inuenim[us] hoc v[niversa]le esse qua[n]titate[m]
p[ro]portionari c[on]uenit solu[m] determi[n]atis qua[n]titatib[us] q[uo] sunt ad aliquid relate
